title: OS Level 5 — Process Synchronization & Critical Section
intro: This level focuses on the need for synchronization, critical section problem and classical solutions.
points: Understand race conditions when multiple processes/threads access shared data.
Define critical section, entry section, exit section and remainder section.
State the three requirements for a correct solution: mutual exclusion, progress, bounded waiting.
Know software solutions like Peterson’s algorithm (concept level).
Understand the idea of hardware support: Test-and-Set, locks (at basic level).
